article_title: U.K.’s Chris Froome Sets Stage for Victory Ride in Tour de France 2015
article_text:
ALPE D’HUEZ, France—Chris Froome’s gaze alternated between the two black jerseys in front of him and the stem of his own bike. As the Briton labored, he lost sight of Nairo Quintana, the man 30 seconds up the road and in second place overall, on one of the Tour’s most famous climbs.

For the first time in two weeks, Froome’s yellow jersey as the Tour’s overall leader was in danger. “I was on my absolute limit,” he said. “I was dying...

twitter.description: Chris Froome of the U.K. is all but guaranteed a victorious entry into Paris in the 2015 Tour de France on Sunday as his main rival, Nairo Quintana of Colombia, couldn’t cut enough into the Briton’s overall lead Saturday.
twitter.creator: @JoshRobinson23
